channel.title: nhjohnst on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS
channel.description: Recent content in nhjohnst on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS

item.title: Nathaniel Ho-Wah Johnston
item.description: As part of his co-op placement, Nathaniel will be working on designing hardware and software control for stabilizing experimental parameters such as the intensity of laser beams. He is very interested in the field control systems and is looking forward to his introduction to research on quantum computers.
